程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners

类 RamProvisionerSimple

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.RamProvisioner
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.RamProvisionerSimple
public class RamProvisionerSimple
extends RamProvisioner
RamProvisionerSimple is an extension of RamProvisioner which uses a best-effort policy to allocate memory to VMs: if there is available ram on the host, it allocates; otherwise, it fails. Each host has to have its own instance of a RamProvisioner.
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0

    • RamProvisionerSimple

      public RamProvisionerSimple​(int availableRam)
      Instantiates a new ram provisioner simple.
      参数:
      availableRam - The total ram capacity from the host that the provisioner can allocate to VMs.

  • 方法详细资料

    • allocateRamForVm

      public boolean allocateRamForVm​(Vm vm, int ram)
      从类复制的说明: RamProvisioner
      Allocates RAM for a given VM.
      指定者:
      allocateRamForVm 在类中 RamProvisioner
      参数:
      vm - the virtual machine for which the RAM is being allocated
      ram - the RAM to be allocated to the VM
      返回:
      $true if the RAM could be allocated; $false otherwise

    • isSuitableForVm

      public boolean isSuitableForVm​(Vm vm, int ram)
      从类复制的说明: RamProvisioner
      Checks if it is possible to change the current allocated RAM for the VM to a new amount, depending on the available RAM.
      指定者:
      isSuitableForVm 在类中 RamProvisioner
      参数:
      vm - the vm to check if there is enough available RAM on the host to change the VM allocated RAM
      ram - the new total amount of RAM for the VM.
      返回:
      true, if is suitable for vm
